name: Vexilar V12 Akku Staubsauger Kabellos, 450W/50000Pa/50 Min Akkustaubsauger mit grünem Licht, Anti-Tangle-Bürste, Leichter, Ideal für Hartböden, Teppiche, Tierhaare
description: 【Up to 50 Mins Runtime&Removable Battery】The V12 Cordless Stick Vacuum with 6x 2600mAh high-performance cells delivers up to 50 minutes of runtime in floor mode (25 min. in carpet mode)making it ideal for a thorough clean of the entire house.The detachable battery can be charged individually or directly on the main unit. | 【Smart LED Dashboard &Green Search Light】The V12 cordless vacuum features an intuitive LED touchscreen that displays real-time battery status, suction modes, and clog alerts – ensuring uninterrupted, efficient cleaning. The 180°flexible brush head with Green Eye Technology (bright LED green light) effortlessly cleans shadowy areas under tables, beds, and sofas—exposing hidden dust for a deeper clean. | 【5-Stage Filtration】The 5-layer filtration system and dual-cyclonic structure achieve efficient dust separation, blocking 99.99% of large particles —ideal for pet owners and allergy sufferers. | 【Lightweight Vacuum Cleaner】: Just 2.2kg!] This cordless vacuum impresses with its ultra-light 2.2kg design – engineered to reduce arm fatigue while delivering full cleaning power. Easily lift and clean high surfaces with one hand. This vacuum is also the best gift for parents/elders
